PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-00552011-02-03,  ,  HC,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectChildren’s Jewellery Regulations
PrecisCHILDREN'S JEWELLERY REGULATIONS - will be made from Item 42 of Part I of Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act in order to limit the amount of lead permitted in children’s jewellery to 600 mg/kg total lead and 90 mg/kg of migratable lead, and to address gaps that otherwise would have been created by the coming into force of the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act on June 20, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0019 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
